metadata.title: Utilize State Transition Matrix Model to Predict the Novel Corona Virus Infection Peak and Patient Distribution

abstract.original_text: Background: Since December 2019, a pneumonia caused by the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has broken out in Wuhan, Hubei province, China. The continuous rising of infected cases has imposed overwhelming pressure on public health decision and medical resource allocation in China. We managed to forecast the infection peak time in Hubei province and the severe and critical case distribution.
